user_query: I'm planning a photo shoot for my friends and we want to experiment with background removal. Can you provide me with the account details, including the remaining credits? After that, I would like to retrieve the result image for a specific image ID and check if the background removal can be recomputed.

TaskList.description: Retrieve account details including remaining credits for background removal service.
Retrieve the result image for the specified image ID.
Check if the background removal for the specified image can be recomputed.
